businessmodel

Class OrderManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • businessmodel.OrderManager

  • public class OrderManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class that represents an order manager. This class handles all the orders for a car manufacturing company.
    Author:
    SWOP team 10

      A inventory for this Order manager
      (package private) java.util.LinkedList<Order> pendingorders
      A list that holds all the pending orders for a car manufacturing company.

      A production scheduler this Order Manager uses.
